title: Skibidi Strike

fullContent: Home› Skibidi ToiletSkibidi StrikeBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenAre you ready to fight with Skibidi toilets in Counter Strike maps? Skibidi Strike is a 3D shooting game where you fight with heads popping out of toilets at each level. You must eliminate a specific number of Skibidis to pass a level in this game.Once the toilet heads spot you, they will move toward you relentlessly. Keep in mind that they are very fast, and they headbutt you when they catch you. Try to survive by shooting them in the head in this action game!ControlsWASD or Arrow Keys: MoveSpace Key: JumpLeft-Shift Key: RunLeft-Click: ShootRight-Click: AimV Key: MeleeT Key: Slow MotionR Key: ReloadG Key: GrenadeTab Key: PauseMouse Scroll: Switch WeaponsAbout Skibidi StrikeWhen you enter the game, you will find yourself in a deserted area as a soldier. On this map, you will encounter many Skibidi toilets. They invaded this place, and they didn't let anyone survive there. However, they haven't met a soldier like you yet!Use your pistol and take them down one by one. Don't let them get close to you, as they will headbutt you if they manage to get closer. Additionally, you will get new and powerful weapons as you make progress in this shooting game!Activate Slowdown ModeIf they are moving fast and you have difficulty aiming them, you can activate the slowdown mode. When you press the "T Key," everything, including the Skibidis, will start to take action slowly. But, of course, you will slow down, too. Thus, it is possible for you to make more precise hits using your weapon.Dodge Their HeadbuttsTheir attack styles are as crazy as they are. When they approach you, they try to hit you by sticking their heads out of the toilet. And this happens very quickly. You should be careful and attack them from a distance if possible.Because if they manage to hit you, they can seriously reduce your health bar. We even recommend using grenades to destroy them with a single shot from a distance. In later levels, you will already have more advanced weapons.DeveloperSkibidi Strike was developed by G55.You May Also LikeIf you enjoy playing Skibidi Strike, you may also like playing Toilets Attack. In the game, you will try to clear the Skibidi toilets from the streets of a metropolitan city. Eliminate all of them!For additional options, you may look for web based shooting games on OnlineGames.io. Please keep coming back to discover new and thrilling online games easily!This article was updated on July 4, 20241 Player3DActionBattleCrazyFreeFunFunnyGunShootingSkibidi ToiletUnityWeapon
